name: ontario
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a province (= a large area that is governed as part of a country) of eastern Canada, whose capital city is Toronto: Canada's capital, Ottawa, is also the second-largest city in Ontario, with a regional population of close to 1.5 million people. The tunnel crosses the Detroit River in Windsor, Ontario.
More examplesFewer examplesAn Ontario judge ordered a court-appointed inspector to investigate.Warnings of flooding continued to be posted for eastern Ontario and Quebec. She is a developmental psychologist at the University of Waterloo in Ontario, Canada.The Conservatives did notably well in Ontario.
